snippet: The F.B.I. has begun a criminal investigation into the Corrections Corporation of America, which ran a prison with a violent reputation that inmates said understaffing helped create.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation begins criminal investigation into the Corrections Corporation of America; Nashville-based company has operated Idaho’s largest prison for more than a decade but company officials acknowledged in 2013 that it had understaffed the prison.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. has begun a criminal investigation into the Corrections Corporation of America, which ran a prison with a violent reputation that inmates said understaffing helped create.

headline.main: Idaho: F.B.I. Enters Investigation Into Prison Operator
headline.print_headline: Idaho: F.B.I. Enters Investigation Into Prison Operator
